DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine response rate patient previously untreated B-cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia treat alemtuzumab rituximab . - To evaluate toxicity alemtuzumab rituximab patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive alemtuzumab subcutaneously day 1 , 3 , 5 week 1-18 rituximab IV day 1 week 3 , 5 , 7 , 9 , 11 , 13 , 15 , 17 absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Peripheral blood bone marrow sample collect periodically laboratory biomarker study . Samples analyze surface marker ( e.g. , CD3 , CD4 , CD8 , CD10 , CD19 , CD20 , CD25 , CD38 , CD52 , Zap-70 ) IgVH PCR , flow cytometry , FISH . Samples also analyze alemtuzumab anti-alemtuzumab antibody level flow cytometry . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically 5 year .
